Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to quantify time and money saved by automations delivered at flow, environment, and tenant level in Power Automate. This feature will reach general availability on October 27, 2025, at Power Platform Conference 25.

How does this affect me?
This feature provides a way to calculate how much time and money a cloud flow is saving to your organization. You can add a user-defined saving rule to each cloud flow, which generates savings at successful cloud flow runs. The aggregated savings trend and total amount can be overseen in the automation center.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Savings in Power Automate.

Title: Power Automate - Quantify time and money savings delivered by automations
